name: Skiploom
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.

poke_body.name: Cotton Balloon
poke_body.effect: If Skiploom has any {G} Energy attached to it, any damage done to Skiploom by attacks from your opponent’s Evolved Pokémon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: U-turn
attacks.effect: Switch Skiploom with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
